title: No chest award after S- (twice)
body:
I didn't get a chest when I got a S- . I thought I'll let it go since I was sure it won't happen again, but it did.
Is it a bug?I was playing flex queue. I did restarted the client, and I still have 4 chest available to earn.

Please help !

edit : 3rd game with S, still no chest :(

replies.body: Were you using the same champion each time? As NoxianPyime mentioned, you can only get 1 chest per champion per season. If you've already gotten a chest with Illaoi this season, you won't get another from playing her regardless of your mastery score with her.

So I think the way it works is you can only earn 1 chest per champion per season, so if you've already earned a chest on a champion, you wont get another one whenever you get an S.

The way you check if you've gotten a chest on a specific champion is by going to your champion collection, hovering over said champion, and it should say "Chest Acquired" under how many points you have on that champ. if you haven't gotten the chest yet it wont say anything. There should also be a thicker box around the champions you've gotten chests on.
